mapper.sql: ID, ORGANIZATION_NO, NAME, PARENT_ID, TYPE, ASSESSMENT_STATE, PHONE_NUMBER, OFFICE_PHONE, FAX, ADDRESS, DESCRIPTION, LEADERSHIP, DEPARTMENTAL_MANAGER, CREATED_USER_ID, CREATED_USER_NAME, CREATED_DATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, AMPUTATED, PATH,ORGANIZATION_CODE,LINKED_ID,FIRST_LETTER,DISPLAY_ORDER,IS_SYNC_QUEUE, ATTENDANCE_RULE_CONFIG_ID,CONFIG_APPROVE,APPROVE_RULE,OUORGCODE
mapper.select:
select
from ORGANIZATION where ID = #{orgaId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and AMPUTATED = 0
mapper.insert: insert into ORGANIZATION (ID, ORGANIZATION_NO, NAME, PARENT_ID, TYPE, ASSESSMENT_STATE, PHONE_NUMBER, OFFICE_PHONE, FAX, ADDRESS, DESCRIPTION, LEADERSHIP, DEPARTMENTAL_MANAGER, CREATED_USER_ID, CREATED_USER_NAME, CREATED_DATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, AMPUTATED, PATH,ORGANIZATION_CODE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{organizationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{assessmentState,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{officePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leadership,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{departmentalManager,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{amputated,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.select:
select
from ORGANIZATION WHERE ID in (${path}) and AMPUTATED =0

select
from ORGANIZATION WHERE path like '%'||#{path}||'%' and AMPUTATED =0 ORDER BY DISPLAY_ORDER

SELECT organization.ID, organization.ORGANIZATION_NO, organization.NAME, organization.PARENT_ID, organization.TYPE, organization.ASSESSMENT_STATE, organization.PHONE_NUMBER, organization.OFFICE_PHONE, organization.FAX, organization.ADDRESS, organization.DESCRIPTION, organization.LEADERSHIP, organization.DEPARTMENTAL_MANAGER, organization.CREATED_USER_ID, organization.CREATED_USER_NAME, organization.CREATED_DATE_TIME, organization.LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, organization.LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, organization.LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, organization.AMPUTATED, organization.PATH, organization.DISPLAY_ORDER, organization.ATTENDANCE_RULE_CONFIG_ID, organization.CONFIG_APPROVE, organization.APPROVE_RULE FROM ORGANIZATION organization WHERE organization.AMPUTATED = 0
organization.NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%' and
ORDER BY organization.DISPLAY_ORDER

SELECT organization.ID, organization.ORGANIZATION_NO, organization.organization_code, organization.NAME, organization.PARENT_ID, organization.TYPE, organization.ASSESSMENT_STATE, organization.PHONE_NUMBER, organization.OFFICE_PHONE, organization.FAX, organization.ADDRESS, organization.DESCRIPTION, organization.LEADERSHIP, organization.DEPARTMENTAL_MANAGER, organization.CREATED_USER_ID, organization.CREATED_USER_NAME, organization.CREATED_DATE_TIME, organization.LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, organization.LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, organization.LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, organization.AMPUTATED, organization.PATH, organization.ORGANIZATION_CODE, organization.DISPLAY_ORDER, organization.ATTENDANCE_RULE_CONFIG_ID, organization.CONFIG_APPROVE, organization.APPROVE_RULE FROM ORGANIZATION organization WHERE organization.AMPUTATED = 0 ORDER BY organization.DISPLAY_ORDER
select count(1) from ORGANIZATION organization where NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and AMPUTATED = 0 ORDER BY organization.DISPLAY_ORDER

SELECT organization.ID, organization.ORGANIZATION_NO, organization.NAME, organization.PARENT_ID, organization.TYPE, organization.ASSESSMENT_STATE, organization.PHONE_NUMBER, organization.OFFICE_PHONE, organization.FAX, organization.ADDRESS, organization.DESCRIPTION, organization.LEADERSHIP, organization.DEPARTMENTAL_MANAGER, organization.CREATED_USER_ID, organization.CREATED_USER_NAME, organization.CREATED_DATE_TIME, organization.LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID, organization.LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME, organization.LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME, organization.AMPUTATED, organization.PATH, organization.DISPLAY_ORDER, organization.organization_code, organization.ATTENDANCE_RULE_CONFIG_ID, organization.CONFIG_APPROVE, organization.APPROVE_RULE FROM ORGANIZATION organization WHERE organization.AMPUTATED = 0 ORDER BY organization.DISPLAY_ORDER
select ID from ORGANIZATION organization where NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and AMPUTATED = 0 ORDER BY organization.DISPLAY_ORDER
select max(ORGANIZATION_NO) from ORGANIZATION
select count(1) from (select ID,ORGANIZATION_NO from ORGANIZATION START WITH ID = 161 connect by prior ID=PARENT_ID) where ORGANIZATION_NO = #{orgaNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select DISTINCT inor.PHONE_NUMBER,inor."NAME",inor.ID,inor.ORGANIZATION_NO from "ORGANIZATION" inor LEFT JOIN "ORGANIZATION" outor on INOR.ORGANIZATION_CODE = OUTOR.ORGANIZATION_CODE and outor.AMPUTATED = 0 where inor.ID=#{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and inor.AMPUTATED=0
SELECT u.username as name,o.PHONE_NUMBER FROM ORGANIZATION o left join USERS u on u.ORGANIZATION_ID =o.id WHERE u.USER_TYPE=1
SELECT PARENT_ID ID FROM ORGANIZATION where AMPUTATED = 0 GROUP BY PARENT_ID HAVING PARENT_ID!=0
SELECT name from ATTENDANCE_RULE_CONFIG where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
